events.title: Community Charity Run
events.description: Join us for our annual 5K charity run through downtown. All proceeds will benefit local schools and education initiatives.

events.title: Summer Food Drive
events.description: Our three-day food collection event to support local food banks during the summer months when donations are typically low.
details: Most Needed: Canned Goods & Dry Pasta

events.title: Youth Education Workshop
events.description: A full-day workshop for underprivileged youth featuring STEM activities, career guidance, and mentorship opportunities.

ourprograms-home.title: What We've Done
paragraphs: Integrating visuals with corresponding text enhances user engagement and comprehension. Proper alignment and placement of images alongside text create a cohesive and aesthetically pleasing layout.
Consistent margins and thoughtful use of white space contribute to a clean design, guiding readers through the content seamlessly.

ourprograms-home.title: Our Achievements
paragraphs: Visual storytelling combined with compelling text creates memorable experiences. Strategic image placement enhances message retention and user engagement.
Careful attention to spacing and layout ensures content flows naturally, improving readability and user satisfaction.

ourprograms-home.title: Recent Projects
paragraphs: Combining powerful imagery with well-crafted text delivers impactful messages. Balanced compositions create professional, trustworthy presentations.
White space and consistent margins establish visual hierarchy, making content more accessible and easier to navigate.

ourmission-about.heading: Education for All
ourmission-about.description: We believe education is a fundamental right. Our programs provide learning opportunities and resources to underserved communities, helping children build a brighter future.

ourmission-about.heading: Health Care
ourmission-about.description: Our healthcare initiatives include medical camps, health awareness drives, and emergency assistance programs to ensure everyone has access to basic healthcare

ourmission-about.heading: Green Earth
ourmission-about.description: Through tree plantation drives, clean water campaigns, and climate education, we work to protect the environment for future generations.

ourvalues-global.heading: Integrity
ourvalues-global.description: We uphold the highest ethical standards in all our actions and decisions.

ourvalues-global.heading: Compassion
ourvalues-global.description: Every initiative stems from genuine care for people and the planet.

ourvalues-global.heading: Inclusivity
ourvalues-global.description: We embrace diversity and ensure our programs reach all communities.

ourvalues-global.heading: Sustainability
ourvalues-global.description: Creating long-term solutions that empower communities to thrive.

ourjourney-about.title: The Beginning
ourjourney-about.description: Founded as a small initiative to provide educational support to 50 children in a local village.

ourjourney-about.title: Expanding Horizons
ourjourney-about.description: Expanded to 10 villages and added healthcare initiatives to our portfolio.

ourjourney-about.title: Registered NGO
ourjourney-about.description: Officially registered as a non-profit organization with a dedicated team of 25 members.

ourjourney-about.title: Going National
ourjourney-about.description: Expanded our operations to 5 states with over 100 volunteers.

ourjourney-about.title: Today
ourjourney-about.description: Operating in 12 states with over 50 programs and impacting more than 100,000 lives annually.

volunteers-global.name: Sarah Johnson
volunteers-global.bio: Passionate about education and youth development programs.

volunteers-global.name: Michael Chen
volunteers-global.bio: Specializes in fundraising and community engagement events.

volunteers-global.name: Priya Patel
volunteers-global.bio: Connects with local businesses for partnerships and sponsorships.

volunteers-global.name: David Wilson
volunteers-global.bio: Develops training programs for new volunteers and team leaders.

volunteers-global.name: Emma Rodriguez
volunteers-global.bio: Shares our stories and impacts through digital platforms.

programs-ourprograms.title: Scholarship Program
programs-ourprograms.description: Monthly scholarships (â‚¹500â€“â‚¹3,000) to support students in rural India, especially girls, reducing school dropouts by easing financial burdens and empowering families to pursue higher education.

programs-ourprograms.title: Career Counselling
programs-ourprograms.description: Psychometric testing, career exploration, and guidance for Classes 9â€“12 students, especially girls, enabling informed choices and connecting them with mentorship circles.

programs-ourprograms.title: Competitive Exam Preparation
programs-ourprograms.description: Academic resources, mentoring, and coaching for government exams (SSC, banking, railway) with structured preparation and peer learning opportunities.

programs-ourprograms.title: E-Literacy Program
programs-ourprograms.description: Teaches rural youth essential digital skills (typing, email, internet) to bridge the digital divide for learning, communication, and job applications.

programs-ourprograms.title: Software Engineering Program
programs-ourprograms.description: Training in coding, web development, and problem-solving to open tech career pathways with hands-on learning and job readiness support.

programs-ourprograms.title: Spoken English & Advanced Communication
programs-ourprograms.description: Develops professional communication skills through role-plays and presentations, boosting fluency for interviews and workplace success.

programs-ourprograms.title: DF Workstation
programs-ourprograms.description: Employment preparation with resume building, interview training, and job referrals to address rural employment gaps.

programs-ourprograms.title: Entrepreneurial Training Program
programs-ourprograms.description: Nurtures business ideas through workshops and financial literacy, promoting self-employment and local enterprise creation.

programs-ourprograms.title: Moose to Mouse Program
programs-ourprograms.description: Engages students in science and robotics through hands-on experiments to inspire STEM exploration and innovation.

image.alt: Students supported by Durga Foundation Scholarship

accordion.title: Program Overview and Details
accordion.content:
The Durga Foundation Scholarship Program is committed to empowering talented students, especially girls, from underprivileged backgrounds who face financial and guidance-related challenges in pursuing education. We believe every child deserves the chance to learn, grow, and succeed regardless of their circumstances.
Our scholarship supports education across various fields including MBA, MBBS, B.Tech, Diplomas, and more. Beyond funding education, we provide mentorship and guidance to help students build successful careers and become changemakers in their communities.
Currently, the program supports hundreds of students from rural and semi-urban areas, and we are on track to extend our support to 500 beneficiaries in the near future.

accordion.title: Success Stories & Impact
accordion.content:
Over hundreds of students supported to continue and complete their education.
Alumni have graduated in diverse fields such as MBA, MBBS, B.Tech, and Diploma courses.
Many beneficiaries now hold prominent roles in multinational companies.
Creating future leaders, professionals, and social changemakers.
Expanding reach to impact 500 students soon.

page.title: Entrepreneurship Program
page.subtitle: Empowering Youth to Become Job Creators

accordion.title: Program Overview
accordion.content: The Entrepreneurship Program by Durga Foundation empowers young minds to become job creators instead of job seekers. The program equips participants with the tools, mindset, and skills to turn ideas into sustainable ventures and lead change in their communities.

accordion.title: Key Learning Areas
accordion.content: Idea Generation & Validation, Business Planning & Strategy, Financial Literacy & Budgeting, Digital Marketing & Branding, Real-World Case Studies & Mentorship, Leadership & Personal Growth.

accordion.title: Entrepreneurial Mindset & Growth
accordion.content: The program fosters creativity, innovation, leadership, and resilience, helping youth develop an entrepreneurial mindset to drive their own futures.

accordion.title: Programs Under the Entrepreneurship Umbrella
accordion.content:
Industrial Training Program â€“ 7-Day Comprehensive Program: Hands-on exposure to real-world business environments and operational learning.
Leadership Boot Camp â€“ 5-Day Youth Development Program: Focused on leadership, problem-solving, and communication to prepare youth for entrepreneurial journeys and personal growth.

accordion.title: Customized for Student Needs
accordion.content: The program structure is customized based on the student group, their background, and learning needs.
